name: Snaag's Hoard
description:
Use the destructive power of fire to puzzle your way through the defenses of the nobility and hoard their gold as Snaag, an adorable dragon with a penchant for all things shiny.

Developed for the 2019 Cryptid game jam, the current submission is only a prototype with a single level.  Continued development is planned with a full release by the end of 2019.
